channel.title: Miscs on zmsy.co
channel.description: Recent content in Miscs on zmsy.co

item.title: Best Music of 2019, Ranked
item.description: Spotify Best of Lists 2019 | 2018 | 2017 | 2016 | 2015 | 2014 | 2013 Best of Blog Posts 2019 | 2018 Year after year, I ask myself: Why? Why is it that I feel the need to create a best-of list every year for the music that I listen to? Is it that I’m remarkably afraid of dying? Is it that I have this cloying need to validate my music taste?

item.title: Best Music of 2018, Ranked
item.description: Spotify Best of Lists 2019 | 2018 | 2017 | 2016 | 2015 | 2014 | 2013 Best of Blog Posts 2019 | 2018 Because I feel a compulsive need deep within my soul to rank things on a regular basis, here’s the return of my personal end-of-year best music list. The Back Half of the Playing Field: 50-21 The latter of the list this year still had a lot quality tracks in it.
